an9.30:1.3: ‘Anattham me acari, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
an9.30:1.4: ‘anattham me carati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
an9.30:1.5: ‘anattham me carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
an9.30:1.8: ‘anattham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
an9.30:1.11: ‘attham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti.
